duties_responsibilities.duty: Design mixed signal hardware for both new and existing Raytheon products.
Collaborate with engineers to perform design trades and requirements flow down, perform electrical analysis, develop test plans, and deliver working hardware.
Provide technical support during the transition to production and support production activities.
Occasional travel to supplier, integration, and customer sites may be required.
Opportunities to manage small projects or processes within the area of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics (STEM) and 5 years of relevant experience OR an Advanced Degree in a related field with 3 years of experience.
